DOC.brief_summary: To monitor for endocrine changes in response to treatment of cataplexy with Xyrem, to focus on the hypothalamic pituitary axis and to confirm the safety of Xyrem on potential endocrine changes.
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Clinical Study to Evaluate Sodium Oxybate (Xyrem) on Potential Endocrine Changes
DOC.criteria: Narcoleptic patients with cataplexy Subjects not diagnosed with narcolepsy with cataplexy
